dcterms:creator: Y. Tian
Q. Gong
W. Shang
Y. Wu
C. L. Zitnick
dcterms:description: Mini-RTS is a small but nontrivial real-time strategy game provided on the ELF platform, designed for reinforcement learning research. It captures the basic dynamics of RTS games, including fog-of-war, resource gathering, troop building, and attacking with troops.
dcterms:title: Mini-RTS

dcterms:creator: Y. Tian
Q. Gong
W. Shang
Y. Wu
C. L. Zitnick
dcterms:description: The ELF platform is an extensive, lightweight, and flexible research platform designed for reinforcement learning research in real-time strategy games.
dcterms:title: ELF platform

dcterms:description: AI-Simple is a built-in rule-based AI in Mini-RTS that simply builds five tanks and then attacks the opponent's base.
dcterms:title: AI-Simple

dcterms:description: AI-Hit-and-Run is a built-in rule-based AI in Mini-RTS that is more aggressive and often harasses the opponent with its tanks.
dcterms:title: AI-Hit-and-Run

dcterms:description: Raw self-play refers to the method where agents play against themselves without any additional strategies or modifications.
dcterms:title: Raw self-play

dcterms:creator: J. Schulman
F. Wolski
P. Dhariwal
A. Radford
O. Klimov
dcterms:description: Proximal Policy Optimization (PPO) is a policy-based reinforcement learning method that simplifies Trust Region Policy Optimization (TRPO) and is used for training agents in various environments.
dcterms:title: PPO (Proximal Policy Optimization)

dcterms:creator: O. Tammelin
dcterms:description: CFR+ (CounterFactual Regret Minimization) is an algorithm used for solving large imperfect information games, providing a method for agents to learn strategies in such environments.
dcterms:title: CFR+ (CounterFactual Regret Minimization)
